Text: Re IntroductionThank you for the introduction For my part I am responsible for finance Regulation at Wessex Our work over the next month is to set out the heads of terms of contracts between the regulated asset company and the new unregulated service company Attached is a note we have prepared setting out payment principles You will see initial thoughts on issues such as who has what risk In considering this it may be useful to note some important points about the UK Water industry viz The Licence holder asset company retains ultimate responsibility and criminal liability for service delivery The UK industry is very political and hence loose contracts are necessary to deal with unexpected events The regulatory reporting requirements are very detailed will require annual information on the costs of both the Licence holder probably the service company On the timing of your vist I am trying to arrange a tour of Wessex its assets for Thursday and or Friday next week You can also discuss some of the issues on the contracts with the in house team unfortunatly I have meeting with the regulator on the Thursday am tied up much of Friday but it is probably better for you to spend time with people doing the real work rather than me Monday can be used for our meeting with the lawyers This will probably be later in the day and go on into the evening I will get you a more detailed itinerary soon with best regards Keith cc John Original Message From To Cc Date June Subject Introduction Name Rod Hayslett Phone Location Houston Enron Building EB FAX EMAIL or whatever you see as the address to this message Background years trying to figure out how to make something a lot more than a regulated return out of a regulated business years in the US Navy reaching the rank of Captain Experience in Finance Accounting Information Systems and Administrative Areas Currently have Commercial responsibilty over some telecommunications startup services companies relating to Rights of Way and fiber optic line rights and coordinating responsibilities over the Pipeline Market Services Area Current Job CFO of Enrons Gas Pipeline Group which means here whatever the boss wants tackled next Home Phone This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the Wessex Water IT Support Centre on or email This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses wwwmimesweepercom STRUCTURE OF CONTRACTS doc

As discussedRod Note as Colin sent to Stan last week Regards Keith Wessex Water valuationdoc This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the Wessex Water IT Support Centre on or email This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses wwwmimesweepercom Wessex Water valuationdoc

FW Credit PoliciesRod Not sure of the context of your request but we have prepared a schedule of our payment options and a code of practice on debt collection Keith Original Message From Sue Lindsay Sent July To Keith Harris Subject RE Credit Policies Keith I have attached the following file showing our current range of payment arrangements this is as shown in the Charges Scheme a copy of our code of practice on debt recovery pages and give detail on timescales for chasing debt and how we go about it It does also give some detail on payment options Is this ok or is it too detailed Cheers Sue Original Message From Keith Harris Sent July To Sue Lindsay Subject FW Credit Policies Sue This is about our payment arrangements when we chase debt Please could you prepare a resume for me K Original Message From Hayslett Rod mailtoRod NRONcom Sent July To Valach William Cherry Paul Ralph Susan Keith Harris Email Cc Piro Jim Peters Jerry Clayton Lawrence Anderson Michael Campos Kathy Subject Credit Policies Would each of you send me a copy of your credit policies or the rules relative to granting of credit credit extended to customers I would expect that it will be in the tariff or some other regulatory document or even a charteer or license I dont need the whole document only the portion relative to credit Please fax or email to me Thanks Rod Hayslett EB FAX This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the Wessex Water IT Support Centre on or email This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses wwwmimesweepercom

RE Status of Project HitchcockRod What is Project Hitchcock It may be something I know about but the code means nothing to me Keith Original Message From Hayslett Rod mailtoRod NRONcom Sent September To Cc Anderson Michael Faldyn Rodney Bickett Kenny Subject FW Status of Project Hitchcock Importance High I need your help in getting this effort started I dont know what the probability is of actually doing what they have in mind as a finalg oal but after a discussion with them yesterday I am convinced there may be some potential value in the study they propose as to our goodwill issues If they can get a larger value from their study for plant purposes than we currently have and they suggest that may be a goal of the study it will help us along towards our goal I dont know what the potential is for success but if they want to do a study and it potentially can help us I think its worth a shot Original Message From Maxey Dave Sent Thursday September PM To Hayslett Rod Subject Status of Project Hitchcock Rod I am following up on our recent meeting concerning Project Hitchcock We have made good progress on a number of the issues and believe it now makes sense to get the following stepsu nderway Meet with Keith Harris and other appropriate Wessex management to provide an overview of the project its benefits and the steps required to implement Initiate a property costsegment study which will be required to determine more precisely the available US tax depreciation As you would expect we will need some additional assistance from Wessex if we are to make this project work We continue to work ons everal other issues in parallel but feel that it makes sense at this point to get the two highlighted steps underway Would you please offer your advice as to the best method for moving forward Regards Dave This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the Wessex Water IT Support Centre on or email This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses wwwmimesweepercom

Risk managementRod A summary of risk management procedures as requested Keith risk management policiesdoc This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the Wessex Water IT Support Centre on or email This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses wwwmimesweepercom

RE Risk managementRod We normally involve Colin my financial controller Nigel Reed the Ops Director Sam Allen and myself Propose that we continue that The question is whether we need a face to face We have done it by phone but I guess that reflects the fact that the AZX guys were comfortable with us Its your call We would be more than happy to do a face to face regards Keith Original Message From Hayslett Rod mailtoRod NRONcom Sent July To Keith Harris Cc Geaccone Tracy Subject RE Risk management How many of you would you think need to be involved in a budget review of Wessex I am trying to make the costs be the lowest but Stan thinks it needs to be face to face Typically Stan would like most of the management team in attendance but if you and Colin have a preference let me know and I will attempt to get it planned out For reference purposes Tracy Geaccone is responsible for pulling together and understanding Stans numbers in addition to being my right and left hands so you and your people will probably start to hear more from her This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the Wessex Water IT Support Centre on or email This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses wwwmimesweepercom

RE Credit PoliciesRod We have an obligation to supply The issue is what payment arrangements are easiest for the customer minimise our risk Keith Original Message From Hayslett Rod mailtoRod NRONcom Sent July To Keith Harris Subject RE Credit Policies Keith I think you must provide service to all who request it Is that the case If not from a credit standpoint how do you determine if you will provide service to a new company or individual Rod Original Message From Keith Harris mailto Sent Tuesday July PM To Rod Hayslett Email Subject FW Credit Policies Rod Not sure of the context of your request but we have prepared a schedule of our payment options and a code of practice on debt collection Keith Original Message From Sue Lindsay Sent July To Keith Harris Subject RE Credit Policies Keith I have attached the following file showing our current range of payment arrangements this is as shown in the Charges Scheme a copy of our code of practice on debt recovery pages and give detail on timescales for chasing debt and how we go about it It does also give some detail on payment options Is this ok or is it too detailed Cheers Sue Original Message From Keith Harris Sent July To Sue license I dont need the whole document only the portion relative to credit Please fax or email to me Thanks Rod Hayslett EB FAX This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and
